name: bnomei/kirby3-htmlhead
description: Kirby 3 Plugin for a best-practice HTML Head Element extendable with snippets.

scripts.build: yarn; cp ./node_modules/loadjs/dist/loadjs.min.js ./assets/js/; cp ./node_modules/webfontloader/webfontloader.js ./assets/js/; composer update; composer dumpautoload -o;
scripts.dev-zip: rm kirby3-htmlhead.zip; composer remove getkirby/cms; composer dumpautoload -o; composer archive --format=zip --file=kirby3-htmlhead; composer require getkirby/cms:'dev-master as 3.0.0'; composer dumpautoload -o;
scripts.zip: rm kirby3-htmlhead.zip; composer update; composer remove getkirby/cms; composer dumpautoload -o; zip -r kirby3-htmlhead.zip . -x *.git* -x 'node_modules'; composer require getkirby/cms:'dev-master as 3.0.0'; composer dumpautoload -o;
